#include <iostream>
#include <string>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int x;
    cin >> x;
    while(x--)
    {
        string a,b;
        cin >> a >> b;
        int val = a.length();
        int val2 = b.length();
        int arr[26] = {0};
        int arr2[26] = {0};
        if(val != val2)
            cout << "NO" << endl;
        else
        {
            for(int x = 0; x < val; x++)
            {
                arr[int(a[x])-97]++;
                arr2[int(b[x])-97]++;
            }
            int num = 26;
            for(int x = 0; x < 26; x++)
            {
                if(arr[x] == arr2[x])
                    num--;
            }
            if(!(num))
                cout << "YES" << endl;
            else
                cout << "NO" << endl;


        }


    }
    return 0;
}
